task.evolve1: evolve cell placement and discrete actuation signal
task.trace: record trajectories for a single morphology

phenotype layout.hexH: hexagonal formation from horizontal shifts in cartesian grid
phenotype layout.hexV: hexagonal formation from vertical shifts in cartesian grid

scaling mode.exp: expand morphology by creating clusters of defined size from individual cells
scaling mode.tes: tessellate morphology by duplicating across larger grid of defined size
